description: The MS-1P17 Ultra Slim Fanless Box PC by MSI is powered by Intel Alder Lake-N processors, providing a low-power solution in three variants for different performance needs. Its fanless 25mm design is aimed at space-constrained installations, while two 2.5 GbE LAN ports deliver fast, reliable networking for demanding environments. Available processor options include the N97, […]
title: Ultra Slim Fanless Box PC Builds on Intel IOTG Alder Lake-N Processors
